vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Φαρές, ὁ indecl. (Heb. פֶּרֶץ, Gen.38:29),
Peres: Mat.1:3, Luk.3:33.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.38.29;
son of: Judah (H3063) and Tamar (H8559);
brother of: Zerah (H2226I);
half-brother of: Er (H6147), Onan (H0209) and Shelah (H7956);
father of: Hezron (H2696H) and Hamul (H2538)
§ Perez, "breaking out"
Perezs, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 1:3; Lk. 3:33*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
法勒斯 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "破壞"
猶大和其兒媳他瑪所生的兒子, 列於耶穌家譜
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
法勒斯 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "破坏"
犹大和其儿媳他玛所生的儿子, 列于耶稣家谱
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Pa-rê; Pha-rê « Một lỗ hổng » Xem H6557
